name: XV-mon
description: ExVeemon is a blue humanoid dragon Digimon with a horn on its nose. It has a white chest and jaw, with an V on its chest, with two lines coming out of the bottom of the V to make it look like an X. It has a yellow V on its head, three fingers on each hand, three toes on its feet and has small horns in place of knuckles. It has a blue tail and white wings.
